com.habelitz.jsobjectizer.marshaller
Interface JSourceMarshaller

All Known Implementing Classes:
AST2JSOM.JSOMMarshaller
public interface JSourceMarshaller

Objects of this type are used to rewrite parsed (and altered) Java source.

Author:
habelitz

Method Summary
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns the parsed Java source as a String.

Method Detail

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Returns the parsed Java source as a String.

The returned string equals the Java source that would be rewritten by the method writeJSOM(...).

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
The parsed Java source as a String.

writeJSOM

void writeJSOM(java.io.Writer pWriter)
               throws MarshallerException
Writes the parsed Java source to the stated Writer object.

Parameters:
pWriter - The writer the parsed Java source should be written to.
Throws:
MarshallerException - if rewriting the Java source has been failed.
